name: MikuMikuPenguin
tagline: MikuMikuDance PMX/VMD Viewer for Windows, OSX, and Linux
body:
### View MMD-related models and motion on the OS of your choice
* Windows, Mac OSX, Linux supported!
* View and animate PMX model files you've downloaded with VMD motion files.
* (Coming soon) Create and Edit VMD motion files

### Develop applications and games that use MMD data
* Use libmmp to gain full and easy access to the contents of MMD data files.
* (libmmp written in C++)

### Support or Contact
If you have trouble getting MMP up and running, please contact @sn0w75 via http://twitter.com/sn0w75 or ibenrunnin@gmail.com!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
